name: Admin Console Release 24.5.0
description: This release of the Admin Console brings you a few bug fixes, see below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Admin Console.

FIXED.text: Site owners can now be optionally added in CC while creating a support ticket.
Admin console is now showing the correct status of additional email ids.
Removed Optional word in certificate configurations which was misleading at the time of Azure configuration.

IMPROVED.text: ID provider certificate is now required for Team Management -> SSO -> SAML
